night_horizons.transformers.preprocessors module¶

class night_horizons.transformers.preprocessors.GeoTIFFPreprocessor(crs: Union[str, CRS] = 'EPSG:3857', passthrough: bool = True, spatial_error: float = 0.0, padding_fraction: float = 0.1)¶

Bases: TransformerMixin, BaseEstimator

Transform filepaths into geotransform properties.

output_columns :

What columns to include in the output.

crs:

The coordinate reference system to use.

n_features_int

The number of features of the data passed to fit().

get_logs(img_log_fp: str, imu_log_fp: str, gps_log_fp: str, tz_offset_in_hr: float = 5.0) → DataFrame¶

Combine the different logs

img_log_df:

DataFrame containing image metadata.

imu_log_df:

DataFrame containing IMU metadata.

gps_log_df:

DataFrame containing GPS metadata.

log_df:

Combined dataframe containing IMU and GPS metadata for each image.
